text: wydwr ealayhim alkhdm bawany altaeam alfdyat, wa'akwab alsharab min alzjaj, zujaj min fdt, qddarha alsqat ealaa miqdar ma yshthy alsharbwn la tazid wala tnqs, wyusqaa hwla' al'abrar fi aljanat kasana mmlw't khmrana mzjt balznjbyl, yashrabun min eyn fi aljanat tusamaa slsbyla; lisalamat shrabha wshwlt msaghh wtybh
